column4: how can i find the usb port a device is using??? ttyUSB1, ttyUSB3 etc etc i have a palm pilot im trying to setup as a card reader and i dont know what port its on
when you plug it look at the last dmesg messages « dmesg | tail -n20 »
thanks ill give it a go
how do i change it so that /dev/ttyUSB1 is /dev/pilot ??
